dcterms:creator: P. A. A. Resende ACD
PAA Resende AD
dcterms:description: The Hogzilla Dataset is a compilation of network flows sourced from the CTU-13 Botnet and ISCX 2012 IDS datasets, encompassing 192 behavioral features per flow. It provides a comprehensive repository of both Botnet behavioral data and normal network traffic.
dcterms:title: Hogzilla Dataset
